mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{loginedMemberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, classId = #{classId}, deadLine = #{deadLine};
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS writerName, IFNULL(G.groupName,'전체') AS groupName FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN `group` AS G ON A.classId = G.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

WITH AMG AS ( SELECT A.*, M.name AS writerName FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE boardId = 5 ) SELECT AMG.*, F.id AS fileId FROM AMG LEFT JOIN `file` AS F ON AMG.id = F.relId GROUP BY AMG.id ORDER BY AMG.id DESC;
